Bienvenu {{parent.nom}} {{parent.prenom}}

Informations du parent

Nom : {{parent.nom}}

Prenom : {{parent.prenom}}

CNE : {{parent.cne}}

Email : {{parent.email}}

Numero de telephone : {{parent.tel}}

Statut de payement :

import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ParentModel} from "../../models/Parent.model"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {HttpService} from "../../services/http.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-parent-page', templateUrl: './parent-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./parent-page.component.css'] }) export class ParentPageComponent implements OnInit{ parent: ParentModel | null | undefined; id: string | null | undefined; constructor(private route:ActivatedRoute,private httpService:HttpService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.id = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.httpService.getParent(this.id).subscribe(result=> { this.parent=result.body; }) } }
